feed.title: Anonymous Overflow Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Anonymous Overflow: 1.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: redirect shortened 'a' URLs by @Bnyro in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/65
  • feat: allow stackoverflow.com/q/ in posthome by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/66

New Contributors

  • @Bnyro made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/65

Full Changelog: https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/compare/v1.10.0...v1.10.1

entry.title: New release for Anonymous Overflow: 1.11.0
entry.content:
üéâ We've hit 200 GitHub stars! ‚≠ê

What's Changed

  • Added overflow.ducks.party instance by @nyuuzyou in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/79
  • Add ao.ngn.tf instance by @ngn13 in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/83
  • fix: add stackoverflow flex classes by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/88
  • Fix theme button redirecting to incorrect URL by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/89
  • Replace StackOverflow Links by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/90
  • feat: allow answerId in shorthand overflow URL by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/91
  • Refactored ViewQuestion
  • Improved code syntax highlighting with new default lexer

New Contributors

  • @nyuuzyou made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/79
  • @ngn13 made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/83

Full Changelog: https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/compare/v1.10.1...v1.11.0

entry.title: New release for Anonymous Overflow: 1.12.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: keep HTML escaped by @sgvictorino in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/96
  • Implement external exchanges by @mattfbacon in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/99
  • improvement: use lang-* classes declared in snippet markup by @sgvictorino in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/97
  • Fixes CSP issue where katex fonts weren't being loaded by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/101

New Contributors

  • @sgvictorino made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/96
  • @mattfbacon made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/99

Full Changelog: https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/compare/v1.11.0...v1.12.0

entry.title: New release for Anonymous Overflow: 1.12.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Upgrade to golang:1.22.1-alpine3.19 by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/103
  • Add redirect endpoint for shortened urls with an answer id by @rramiachraf in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/105
  • chore: upgrade deps by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/106

New Contributors

  • @rramiachraf made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/105

Full Changelog: https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/compare/v1.12.0...v1.12.1

entry.title: New release for Anonymous Overflow: v1.13.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove a.opnxng.com as it is rate-limited by @extremelyonline in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/110
  • Update Location for Project Segfault instances by @gi-yt in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/109
  • fix code not visible in light theme by @patrick330602 in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/114
  • Set maximum width to 40rem across screen sizes by @McSinyx in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/111
  • Wrap Answers heading on narrow screens by @McSinyx in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/112
  • Let title hyphenate to avoid x-overflow on mobile by @McSinyx in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/113
  • fix: remove alt from homepage logo, add "logo" alt to question header by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/116
  • feat: only show question answers if they exist by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/119
  • Update link to SudoVanilla instance by @SudoVanilla in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/124
  • fix: scrape answer comments by @sgvictorino in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/128
  • Instance Hub by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/131
  • Support exchange shortened URLs by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/133
  • fix: set answer ID to data-answerid value by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/135
  • New instance: https://anonflow.aketawi.space/ by @aketawi in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/138
  • media query theme by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/139
  • feat: add healthcheck by @rare-magma in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/141
  • Instance domain change by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/144
  • Add theme support using environment variable by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/145
  • Add version endpoint by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/146
  • Update README link to Proxy_Redirect by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/147
  • Instance operator change - soflow.nerdvpn.de by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/148
  • Add support for arm64 docker builds using Buildx+QEMU by @flexxxxer in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/152

New Contributors

  • @extremelyonline made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/110
  • @patrick330602 made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/114
  • @McSinyx made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/111
  • @aketawi made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/138
  • @rare-magma made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/141
  • @flexxxxer made their first contribution in https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/pull/152

Full Changelog: https://github.com/httpjamesm/AnonymousOverflow/compare/v1.12.1...v1.13.0
